resources.string: storage could not be opened.\nThis occurs when the camera is not available (for example it is already in use) or if the system has denied access (for example when camera access has been disabled).
This sample shows a basic implementation for requesting permissions at runtime.\nClick the button below to request the Camera permission and open a full-screen camera preview.

This sample shows a basic implementation for requesting permissions at runtime. Click the button to request the Camera permission and open a full-screen camera preview.
Note: The "RuntimePermissions" sample provides a more complete overview over the runtime permission features available.
storage access is required to display the preview.
Permission is not available. Requesting storage permission.
storage permission is available. Starting preview.
storage permission was granted. Starting preview.
